To avoid hardcoded years, the year of season can be accessed with @project.season.year

body:
You can probably copy the `app/views/applications/create` view and adapt it. The `ProjectsController#create` action would have to be changed so that it doesn't redirect anymore.

To avoid hardcoded years, the year of season can be accessed  with `@project.season.year`
